snippet.title: White Lavender (demo) - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
A demo for White Lavender is out now! 

Check it out on Itch.io: https://sokpop.itch.io/white-lavender
Or wishlist it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1975670

It is a challenging adventure game with RPG-elements. Journey through a colorful miniature world, collect cool items like pencils and party hats, grow strong, meet magic frogs and beetles, and battle mean critters on your journey to brew a special tea to save your sister!

The full version will probably release end of May/early April.

Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/sokpop
Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/invite/Ye3HrWW

You can claim a key here if you were a Sokpop Patron in March: https://sokpop.co/patreon_access/
